item.title: HBAN
item.description: score:993 Chances: Appointment of Marcy Hingst as General Counsel of Huntington National Bank. Huntington Bancshares announces an increase in its prime rate to 8.5%. Positive second-quarter profit for Huntington Bancshares due to rising interest rates and strong demand for commercial loans. Stabilizing deposits and positive economic data contributing to optimism for avoiding a full-blown recession.
